title: Profile Preference
description: Set your profile preferences to control who can view your resume, indicate if you're available to join immediately, and manage access to your Video CV.
forPrivate: Employers cannot view your Bdjobs resume and Video resume from Bdjobs CV Bank. Your resume will only be seen for the job you applied for.
forPublic: All Employer(s) can see your profile.
forNo: Your availability will not visible to employers.
forYes: Employers will see that you can join immediately.
availabilityVisible: Employers will see that you can join immediately.
availabilityHidden: Your availability will not be visible to employers.
cvVisibleToAll: Your CV is visible to all employers.
cvNotVisible: Your CV is not visible to any employers.
cvWillBeVisibleToAll: Your CV will be visible to all employers.
cvWilNotBeVisibleToAll: Your CV will not be visible to any employers.
